system.description: Create a cyclone (10 ft. wide at base, 30 ft. at top, 30 ft. tall) that moves 60 ft./round. Directing it or changing programmed movement is a standard action. Large or smaller creature touching it: Reflex or 3d6 damage. Medium or smaller failing first save: second save or picked up, 1d8 damage/round. You can eject carried creatures when you wish.
system.target: Cyclone 10 ft. base, 30 ft. top, 30 ft. tall
